subject: United Nations Office
body:
United Nations Office
United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)
Bd du Régent 37, 1000 Bruxelles, Belgium
Dear Beneficiary 
Subject: Compensation Fund Payment Center
This is to notify you that your name has being enlisted to compensate of earthquake and tsunami disasters , flood triggered meltdown, infection and illness of any kind, accident medication support, disability physically challenge, lost of job, Scam Victims, Air crash victims relatives and pensioner etc of compulsory compensation fund of Nine Hundred and Thirty Thousand Dollars (US$930,000.00) allocated per person in your country. The compensation includes financial relief to help citizens and resident that was displaced to rebuild their personal
life's, Career, business and infrastructures, etc.
This program is launched by the U.N. Compensation Commission (UNCC) and supported by World Bank (IMF) and the payment will be processed and ready for payment via swift transfer or unlimited ATM CARD or BITCOIN  which you can cash /withdraw your funds daily from your country and any other country you may travel to and your details is to be forwarded to the bank information below for payment and processing authorized for your payment.
http:/ /www.iraq-businessnews.com/tag/united-nations-compensation-commission/
UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION COMMISSION PAYS OUT $195 MILLION | UN Press
You can view the above link for some information about the Compensation, reply immediately Should you follow our directives, your funds will be credited and reflect in your bank account within five (5) bank working
days from the day you obtain this Affidavit of Claim  Certificate.
For further details and assistance on this Remittance Notification,kindly forward the below information
FULL NAME:
FULL CONTACT ADDRESS:
TELEPHONE NUMBER:
OCCUPATION:
AGE:
Regards
Mr. Boris Katsnelson
Head UNCC .
Kindly contact with your information to this below email address for
proceeding.

subject: Re:   United Nations Office
body:
Dear Mr. Boris Katsnelson,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the compensation program for various disasters and victims. I appreciate the information you have provided. Can you please clarify how the funds will be distributed? Will it be a one-time payment or spread out over a period of time?

Additionally, could you provide more details about the process of obtaining the Affidavit of Claim? Is there any documentation or paperwork that needs to be completed on my end?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: United Nations Office
body:
United Nations Office
United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)
Bd du Régent 37, 1000 Bruxelles, Belgium

Dear Mary,

We acknowledge the receipt of your email and wish to confirm that your
questions have been noted and answers are being provided herein. As you
read in the previous message, you have the option to receive the payment
either through bank transfer, ATM card payment, Online bank account or
draft cheque. This will depend on your preferred option as you  will be
presenting to the paying bank. In regards to the affidavit, the contact of
the fiduciary agent lawyer will be made available to you on receipt of the
information as requested to prepare your compensation certificate.

For further details and assistance on this Remittance Notification,kindly
forward the below information

FULL NAME:
FULL CONTACT ADDRESS:
TELEPHONE NUMBER:
OCCUPATION:
AGE:
Regards
Mr. Boris Katsnelson
Head UNCC.

subject: Re: United Nations Office
body:
Dear Mr. Boris Katsnelson,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your assistance in providing answers to my questions. I would like to know more about the different payment options available.

1. Could you please explain how the bank transfer option works? What are the necessary steps and requirements for this method?

2. For the ATM card payment, how long does it usually take for the card to be delivered? Are there any fees associated with this option?

3. Regarding the online bank account option, do I need to have an existing account with a specific bank? How secure is this method?

4. Lastly, what is involved in receiving the payment through a draft cheque? Are there any limitations or restrictions when using this method?

I look forward to your detailed response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: United Nations Office
body:
United Nations Office
United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)
Bd du Régent 37, 1000 Bruxelles, Belgium

Hello Mary,

I have received your email and concern as stated, however the most
important at this point is the issuing of your compensation certificate
which will entitle you with the payment by any option you will decide
after. However I will advise you to opt for  the telegraphic transfer as
you will receive the money directly to your existing account and there will
not be a situation where you experience any difficulty in cashing the bank
draft or misplacing the ATM.

Let me have your requested details for the certificate to be issued and you
will be directed on the contact to be made to receive the fund.
Regards
Mr. Boris Katsnelson
Head UNCC.

subject: Re: United Nations Office
body:
Hello Mr. Boris Katsnelson,

Thank you for your email and for providing this information. I appreciate your assistance with the issuing of the . Could you please let me know what specific details you require from me in order to proceed with this process? I want to ensure that everything is in order for a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your guidance on the next steps.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: United Nations Office
body:
Hello Mary,

Kindly send me the following,
FULL NAME:
FULL CONTACT ADDRESS:
TELEPHONE NUMBER:
OCCUPATION:
AGE:
Regards,
Mr. Boris Katsnelson

subject: Re: United Nations Office
body:
Hello Mr. Boris Katsnelson,
Sure, I can help you with that. What exactly do you need me to send you?
Looking forward to assisting you further.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: United Nations Office
body:
Hello Mr. Boris Katsnelson,
Sure, I can help you with that. What specific information do you need from me?
Looking forward to assisting you further.
